snippet: Abu Dhabi National Energy has sold its 7 percent stake in the electric carmaker Tesla Motors, Reuters reports. The firm, which sold 7.3 million shares, reported a profit of $113 million from its investment.
abstract: Abu Dhabi National Energy has sold its 7 percent stake in the electric carmaker Tesla Motors, Reuters reports. The firm, which sold 7.3 million shares, reported a profit of $113 million from its investment.

headline.main: Abu Dhabi National Energy Sells Tesla Stake
